directions: Combine all the ingredients in a blender and blend until very smooth. You should have a bright green emulsified sauce. Use immediately or cover and refrigerate in an airtight container for up to 5 days.
ingredients: 2 Hungarian wax peppers, stemmed and coarsely chopped (seeds are good) (see Cooks' Note below)
1 1/2 cups fresh cilantro leaves (from one large bunch or two small ones)
1 1/2 cups fresh flat-leaf parsley leaves (from one bunch)
title: Zhoug (Spicy Herb Sauce)
